n = int(input())

t = input()

s = []

for i in range(n):
    if i == 0 or t[i] != t[i-1]:
        s.append(t[i])

print(''.join(s))

n = int(input())
t = list(input())
s = ""
for i in range(n):
    if i == 0 or t[i] != t[i-1]:
        s += t[i]

print(len(s))

n = int(input())  # 3
t = input()  # aab

s = [t[0]]

for i in range(1, n):
    if t[i] != t[i-1]:
        s.append(t[i])
print(''.join(s))

n = int(input())
t = input()
s = t[0]
for i in range(n):
    if t[i] != s[-1]:
        s += t[i]

print(s)
